functions.name: FCTS
functions.body:
{ 
    FCTS_DEDUP
    | summarize arg_max(enqueuedtime, *) by sensor_id, timestamp
    | join kind=leftouter (database('Global').RegistryStreams) on sensor_id
    | extend uom = iif(isnotempty(uom1), uom1, uom)
    | project site_code, sensor_id, data_source, timestamp, timestamp_local, value, uom, quality, annotations, stream_details, enqueuedtime
}

functions.name: FCTSCURRENT
functions.body:
{
    FCTS_CURRENT_VALUE
    | summarize arg_max(enqueuedtime, *) by sensor_id
    | join kind=leftouter (database('Global').RegistryStreams) on sensor_id
    | extend uom = iif(isnotempty(uom1), uom1, uom)
    | project site_code, sensor_id, data_source, timestamp, timestamp_local, value, uom, quality, annotations, stream_details, enqueuedtime
}
